Mayor Thomas Schoenbein

Contact Mayor

  1. Thomas Schoenbein

    Mayor
    Email
    Phone: 713-475-5545

    1149 Ellsworth Dr.,Pasadena, Tx 77506


Biography

Thomas Schoenbein has been a proud resident of Pasadena for more than 50 years. He and his wife, Bonnie, are the proud parents of two children and grandparents to three grandchildren.

With a broad range of experience, Thomas brings valuable insight and leadership to Pasadena’s diverse community. He spent 12 years with Phillips Chemical Company, gaining firsthand knowledge of the petrochemical industry, and built on that foundation with a 20-year career at Academy Sports and Outdoors, strengthening his understanding. After retiring in 2018, he earned his real estate license in 2019.

Thomas is a dedicated community member and actively participates in South Main Baptist Church. He served on the Pasadena Education Foundation and was involved with the Pasadena Chamber of Commerce. He has shown a strong commitment to youth development through coaching baseball, basketball, and girls’ softball. He also served as president of the Pasadena Umpires Association and is a proud graduate of the Pasadena Citizens Police Academy.
